H0.text: Who first drew Mickey Mouse when ?Disney first supplied the voice. Walt Disney

H1.text: Who first drew Mickey Mouse when ?Disney first supplied the voice. Les Clark

H2.text: Who first drew Mickey Mouse when ?Disney first supplied the voice. Wilfred Jackson

H3.text: Who first drew Mickey Mouse when ?Disney first supplied the voice. Ub Iwerks

A7.text: Iwerks revised Disney's provisional sketches to make the character easier to animate
